title: New: Wolf Alice – Freazy
content:
With their fantastic debut album released next week, Wolf Alice have gradually been teasing tracks from My Love Is Cool (alongside a full stream if that’s your bag). Freazy, one of the album’s standout tracks, showcases a truly unique side to the group, it’s anthemic, pop-tinged yet somehow utterly unlike anything else they’ve done before. Check it out below and pre-order the LP here.

Follow our Spotify On Repeat playlist for a hand-picked selection of the current hottest tracks.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
